scripts.migrate:up: docker compose --env-file ./environments/.env.docker -f docker-compose.yml --profile core run --build --rm -e ENABLE_SEED_DATA=false migrate
scripts.migrate:up:seed: docker compose --env-file ./environments/.env.docker -f docker-compose.yml --profile core run --build --rm -e ENABLE_SEED_DATA=true -e "SEED_COMMAND=npm run db:seed --workspace=ecotrack-database" migrate
scripts.migrate:status: docker compose --env-file ./environments/.env.docker -f docker-compose.yml --profile core run --rm migrate sh -c "./infrastructure/scripts/migrate.sh status"
